IRS990.Desc: NORTH RANGE BEHAVIORAL HEALTH PROVIDES TREATMENT FOR SUBSTANCE ABUSE AND MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES THROUGH A VARIETY OF SERVICES INCLUDING RESIDENTIAL AND OUTPATIENT PROGRAMS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART IV, LINE 2B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NORTH RANGE RECEIVES AND HOLDS PERSONAL FUNDS OF SOME RESIDENTIAL CLIENTS. THESE FUNDS ARE REPORTED AS RESTRICTED CASH WITH AN OFFSETTING LIABILITY IN THE ACCOMPANYING BALANCE SHEET.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XI, LINE 4B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NETTED FUNDRAISING EXPENSES -2,595 2016 INCOME FROM PHO 6,635

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XII, LINE 2D

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE OFFICERS AND A COPY IS PROVIDED TO MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO IT BEING FILED WITH THE IRS.

BOARD MEMBERS, OFFICERS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO REPRESENT ANNUALLY THEY ARE IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. COMPLIANCE IS ALSO MONITORED AT EACH BOARD MEETING UPON OR BEFORE ELECTION OR APPOINTMENT TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. BOARD MEMBERS WILL PROVIDE A WRITTEN DISCLOSURE OF INTERESTS, RELATIONSHIPS, AND HOLDINGS THAT COULD POTENTIALLY RESULT IN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST. THIS WRITTEN DISCLOSURE WILL BE KEPT ON FILE AND UPDATED AS APPROPRIATE. IN THE COURSE OF MEETINGS OR ACTIVITIES, KNOWN AND POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST SHOULD BE DISCLOSED TO THE ENTIRE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IN ADVANCE OF A TRANSACTION SO THAT THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS CAN DETERMINE WHETHER IT IS NECESSARY FOR THE DIRECTOR TO REMOVE HIMSELF OF HERSELF FROM DISCUSSIONS AND/OR DECISIONS ON THE MATTER.

A COMPENSATION AND BENEFITS SURVEY OF COLORADO COMMUNITY MENTAL HEALTH EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS IS CONSIDERED IN SETTING THE COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. THE COMPENSATION AMOUNT IS APPROVED BY THE INDEPENDENT BOARD OF DIRECTORS.
COMPENSATION FOR OTHER OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES IS BASED ON A SALARY SURVEY AND THE BUSINESS NEEDS AND FINANCIAL RESOURCES OF THE ORGANIZATION.
THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, COPIES OF POLICIES, TAX RETURNS, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
CHANGE IN FV OF INTEREST RATE SWAP 76,558
